channel.title: Server.java
channel.description:
is there a way for me to make it ignore my ip from my server.. well for example some 1 hacked my server some how and he ip baned me when i logged in which was kinda stupid cuase ipban logs =p but is there a way for my server to ignore my ip...
and another problem when i run server on here then get on it from another computer on my network it changes all incomming ips to the computer im on my srever with.. thats another reason i need it to ignore my ip
